message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more now, but you'll have a better chance to propose later.
Let's split things a bit more evenly this time, Alice. Time is money, you know!
Bob, my friend, time might be money, but patience is a virtue. This offer is more in line with the shrinking pot.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
